definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pt. act. pl. [[דָּֽחְלִין]] Da 5:19, c. [[מִן־קֳדָם]] of king, Da 6:27, id. of God; pass. [[דְּחִיל]] terrible Da 2:31, f. [[דְּחִילָה]] Da 7:7, Da 7:19.

definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וִידֵחֲלִנַּנִי]] Da 4:2 the dream made me afraid.
